Question: On March 14, 1967, this person's body was moved to a permanent burial plot and memorial at the Cemetery.
Hints: This person was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
A Catholic, this person is the only non-Protestant president, and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
In August 2009, his brother, Senator Edward M ****, was also buried near his two brothers.
